question:
Following India’s nuclear explosions at Pokhran in 1998, which of the following were the responses?
(i) The US condemned nuclear tests of both India and Pakistan
(ii) UN Security Council passed resolution condemning nuclear explosions
(iii) The US and its Strategic allies imposed economic sanctions on India
(iv) Following US pressures India consented to sign NPT.
Choose the correct answer from the code given below:
explanation:
After the nuclear test conducted by India and Pakistan in 1998 United States issued a statement condemning both India and Pakistan.
 United Nations Security Council passed a resolution condemned the tests and demanded that both countries refrain from engaging in further tests.
 The United States imposed economic sanctions on India.
 Despite pressure by the US, India refused to signatory of Non-Proliferation Treaty.
